name: Another Dive
description:
Another Dive

this video game was made for the DiveJam2 in only 13 hours with the theme Depth

World : 

You are on Yrenia, a new planet where you live.
Today is like other days, you go free diving.
Your challenge in this game is to go down in the depth…

Move :

Z Q S D  or  W A S D - change direction

K and L  - move forward 

You have to press K - L - K - L - K - L... again and again to move forward.

It's like you are moving your arms left - right - left - right… again and again…

I hope you will enjoy the game (good luck because it's insanely difficult)
